definition: to wait at one's ease for the exhausted enemy/to nurture one's strength and bide one's time (idiom)
abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
to wait/to treat/to deal with/to need/going to (do sth)/about to/intending to
to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)
